My Work

Check out some of my past projects...

×

Swanpool nature reserve is located in Falmouth, Cornwall, and managed by the swanpool forum. Their old website has not been updated in over 6 years and the access credentials had been lost, so they reached out to me to build a new-and-improved site for them. I used the wordpress CMS to design and build a new website which retained most of the material from the old one, while providing the comittee of the Swanpool Forum with the ability to update and edit the content whenever they please. I also set up domain nameservers and hosting myself.

Swanpool Nature Reserve No Github Available
×

I created theis chrome browser extension as more of an experiment than anything else. I wanted to know how extensions were built, so figuredd the best way to learn was to dive in and make my own! Dashboard is a simple, minimalist new-tab replacer. It features images that change based on the time of day, behind a large central clock. It also allows the user to customise it with their name and their focus for the day. in the future, i plan to contnue adding functionality to it. This may include a built-in search bar, weather widget, theme toggler, more images and probably plenty more.
